Title: Looks Like American TikTok’s Problems Are Sending Users Flocking to Alternatives
Description: TikTok isn’t in great shape lately, and it looks like some users have had enough.

Title: Neil Young offers Greenlanders free access to his archives
Description: Young says he hopes the offer will "ease some of the unwarranted stress and threats" Greenlanders feel over Trump's threats to the territory.

Title: 'What if I just started shouting?' - when to worry about intrusive thoughts
Description: Dr Nina Higson-Sweeney, who was diagnosed with OCD when she was 10, explains when you should seek help.

Title: As if on cue, the Nothing Phone 4a Pro has leaked, with not as much as I hoped
Description: Additional rumors suggested the Nothing Phone 4a Pro has passed its certification overseas with small specification upgrades.

Title: iPhone 18 Pro Could Feature Teleconverter Alongside Variable Aperture
Description:
Apple's rumored new variable aperture camera system for this year's iPhone 18 Pro models has reached the sampling stage, according to a new claim from a Chinese leaker.
Posting on Weibo today, the account known as "Smart Pikachu" said the feature had ent…

Title: NotebookLM Review: Bring Your Own Sources to This Ultra-Practical Google AI Tool
Description: Whether you're learning, working or creating, NotebookLM delivers the goods.

Title: Americans may love football, but did you know its origins are in medieval England?
Description:
"Football" is a word used to refer to different games: American football, the game played at the Super Bowl, where a foot is rarely used to direct the ball.
And elsewhere in the world, football refers to what Americans call "soccer." But where does this word …

Title: 3 generations of women in one family show how choices on motherhood have changed
Description:
In one family, three generations of American women explore how choices around becoming mothers have changed at the same time the U.S.
birth rate has dropped.

Title: Spain will grant legal status to immigrants lacking authorization
Description: Spain's government announced Tuesday it will grant legal status to potentially hundreds of thousands of immigrants living and working in the country without authorization.

Title: NTSB blames 'deep' systemic failures for deadly midair collision near Washington D.C.
Description: After a yearlong investigation, the National Transportation Safety Board did not find a single cause for the deadly collision near Washington, D.C., but blamed the crash on multiple systemic failures.

Title: It's the foundation of psychiatric diagnosis. And it's about to get a makeover
Description:
The current edition of the Diagnostic and Statistical Manual is known as the DSM-5.
What will the next version be called? That's one of several open questions as the "Bible of psychiatry" goes online.

Title: How bystander videos of law enforcement have shaped public understanding
Description:
Bystander videos have shaped public perception for decades.
The ability to now spread video widely can lead to real-time access and transparency, but experts say videos can't tell the full story.

Title: To keep AI out of her classroom, this high school English teacher went analog
Description: Forth Worth teacher Chanea Bond says sticking with pen and paper keeps generative artificial intelligence out of her American literature classes.

Title: Asteroid 2024 YR4 Has a 4% Chance of Hitting the Moon
Description:
An anonymous reader quotes a report from Universe Today: There's a bright side to every situation.
In 2032, the Moon itself might have a particularly bright side if it is blasted by a 60-meter-wide asteroid.
The chances of such an event are still relatively s…

Title: The headlines to look out for as Big Tech reports earnings
Description:
Seven companies with market caps totalling more than $20 trillion are checking in.
I broke down what to keep an eye out for with each of them.

Title: Some Amazon employees get 'Project Dawn' calendar invitation discussing upcoming job cuts
Description:
The invitation was written by Amazon executive Colleen Aubrey.
It was cancelled soon after being sent, stoking confusion among some employees.

Title: Ukrainian drone schools say there's little the West can teach them about fighting a drone war
Description: Ukraine's drone schools are closely following the fast-developing drone battle and say their expertise only comes from Ukrainians, not Western allies.

Title: If You Need a Mini Gaming PC Instead of the Mac Mini, This KAMRUI Hyper H2 Is 40% Off on Amazon
Description:

Title: Beloved CBS meteorologist killed in plane crash: ‘Our community won’t be the same’
Description: He was one of two people killed when their plane crashed into a river.
